info.description: A comprehensive REST API for baseball statistics serving data from the Lahman Baseball Database and Retrosheet
info.title: Baseball API

get.description: Get All-Star Game history by joining Lahman participation data with Retrosheet game logs
Get detailed information and participant list for a specific All-Star game sourced from Retrosheet game logs
Get a list of all baseball awards
Get detailed information about a specific award including winners
Get ejections with optional filters for player, umpire, team, and role
List all baseball franchises with optional active filter
Get details for a specific franchise
Search and browse games with optional filters and pagination
Get all pitches from a specific plate appearance within a game
get.summary: Get pitches for a specific plate appearance

get.description: Get play-by-play win probability for a game
Get detailed information for a specific game
Get detailed boxscore statistics for a specific game including team stats and lineups
Get all play-by-play events for a game (alias for /games/{id}/plays)
Get a single play/event by sequence number
Get all pitches for a specific game in chronological order
Get all plays for a specific game in chronological order
Get narrative summary for a game including winning pitcher, save, and key events
Get all-time career batting leaders for a specific statistic

parameters.description: Statistic (hr, avg, rbi, sb, h, r, ops)
parameters.name: stat

get.description: Get all-time career pitching leaders for a specific statistic
Get a paginated list of all managers
Get detailed information about a specific manager
Get all season records for a specific manager
Returns API version, dataset freshness, coverage, and schema fingerprints
Returns dataset ETL metadata and coverage
Lists available MLB Stats API proxy routes surfaced under /v1/mlb. All endpoints default to sportId=1 (Major League Baseball) unless specified.
Proxy to MLB Stats API /v1/awards. Defaults to sportId=1 (Major League Baseball) if not provided.
Proxy to MLB Stats API /v1/awards/{awardId}
Proxy to MLB Stats API /v1/people for live roster metadata. Defaults to sportId=1 (Major League Baseball) if not provided.

parameters.description: Filter by sportId (defaults to 1 for MLB)
parameters.name: sportId

get.description: Proxy to MLB Stats API /v1/people/{personId}
Proxy to MLB Stats API /v1/schedule. Defaults to sportId=1 (Major League Baseball) if not provided.
Proxy to MLB Stats API /v1/seasons. Defaults to sportId=1 (Major League Baseball) if not provided.
Proxy to MLB Stats API /v1/standings. Note: sportId defaults to 1 (Major League Baseball).
Proxy to MLB Stats API /v1/stats for ad-hoc stats lookups. Note: sportId defaults to 1 (Major League Baseball).
Proxy to MLB Stats API /v1/teams. Defaults to sportId=1 (Major League Baseball) if not provided.
Proxy to MLB Stats API /v1/teams/{teamId}
Proxy to MLB Stats API /v1/venues. Defaults to sportId=1 (Major League Baseball) if not provided.
Get a paginated list of all ballparks
Get detailed information about a specific ballpark
Get all games played at a specific ballpark
get.summary: Get games played at a ballpark

get.description: Query individual pitches derived from play-by-play pitch sequences

parameters.description: Filter by pitch type (B, C, F, S, X, etc.)
parameters.name: pitch_type

parameters.description: Filter to only pitches in play (X)
parameters.name: is_in_play

get.description: Search and browse players with optional name filter and pagination

Get Hall of Fame voting records for a player
get.summary: Get player Hall of Fame records

get.description: Return plate appearances where the player is the batter with optional filters

get.description: Get all plays involving a specific player (as batter or pitcher)
Return all salary records for a player from Lahman Salaries table
Get season-by-season batting and pitching statistics for a player
Get comprehensive batting statistics for a player including career totals and season-by-season breakdowns
Get comprehensive pitching statistics for a player including career totals and season-by-season breakdowns
List every season/team combination a player appeared in
Get hitting or scoreless innings streaks for a player
Query plays with various filters
Natural language game search supporting queries like "yankees red sox 2004 alcs game 7" or "dodgers giants 2014 nlcs"
Ballpark lookup by name, city, state, or park ID

get.description: Search teams by name, city, or franchise

length.description:
Length of the streak:
- For hitting: number of consecutive games with 1 hit.
- For scoreless innings: total consecutive innings without allowing a run.

start_date.description: ISO-8601 dates (YYYY-MM-DD) to keep JSON lightweight and frontend-friendly.

timeline.description: Timeline for charts or detailed views.

x-enum-comments.StreakKindHitting: Hitting streak: consecutive games with at least one hit.
x-enum-comments.StreakKindScorelessInnings: Scoreless innings streak for a pitcher or team staff.

x-enum-descriptions: Hitting streak: consecutive games with at least one hit.
Scoreless innings streak for a pitcher or team staff.

points.description: One point per play/event, ordered by EventIndex ascending.

bases.description:
Simple base-state encoding
Example: "100" = runner on 1st only, "011" = runners on 2nd & 3rd.

home_win_prob.description: Win probabilities for each team AFTER the event (0.01.0).
